activities:
Reckitt Benckiser Pharmaceuticals Inc. (RBP) is a global pharmaceutical manufacturer with headquarters in Richmond, Virginia.  Our parent company Reckitt Benckiser is located in the UK (Reckitt Benckiser Group plc) and in Parsippany, New Jersey (Reckitt Benckiser LLC).  The pharmaceutical business has agreements in place with our parent company to perform shared service functions around human resource data exchanges (processing of payroll, benefits, pension, employment information, etc.).  This information exchange does occur frequently.
Since RBP is a global pharmaceutical manufacturer, we may engage in pharmaceutical research (e.g., clinical trials, research, etc.) in which we may have data exchanges between EU to the US and Swiss to the US.  This information exchanges occurs on an as-needed basis when we have pharmaceutical research in the impacted locations.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Croatia, Czech Republic, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Italy, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: On-line Data, Off-line Data, Manually Processed Data and Human Resources Data
privacyprograms: TRUSTe and TRUSTe's Dispute Resolution Services
recoursemech: TRUSTe Privacy Program with TRUSTe's Dispute Resolution Services
